de.ovgu.featureide.core.images

Class ImagesComposer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.ComposerExtensionClass
      • de.ovgu.featureide.core.images.ImagesComposer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.IComposerExtensionBase, de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.IComposerExtensionClass, de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.IExtension

    public class ImagesComposer
extends de.ovgu.featureide.core.builder.ComposerExtensionClass
    Images composer through images overlapping. Images in the different feature folders need to have the same relative path to be combined.
    Author:
    Jabier Martinez
